title: Momentum TW earbuds playback at 48000kHz, not 44100kHz. Why?
content: I have some Sennheiser Momentum True Wireless earbuds.  They play back my FLAC files in 48000kHz, not CD standard 44100kHz.  Is there a way to make the correct sampling rate a permanent adjustment with my phone?  Going into Developer Options all the time is getting annoying.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
